column4: Im impressed with ubuntu /linux/debian i installed the latest stable on my laptop, an LG R200 and i dont need to do nothing weird all my drivers works
But no replacement for SideShow T_T
thats how it mostly is now. dont know why it is still not gaining mass adoption
the new laptops like my new one has an display 2,5 inches on the back, with Windows SideShow now we need to hack that :p
